name: Tiny Turret
description: Hi guys! I'm a beginner at this so I wanted to make a little game in an hour just for some practice. This game kinda went over time with me finishing it in about two and half hours. There were some things I learned while making this game like how to use events and do some follow mouse movement. One thing that definitely made the game go overtime is the Googling I had to do, I guess it's just one thing that comes with experience.  I do want to make some fixes to the game and the code but I feel like it'll be better just to have this as a kind of milestone to judge future projects on, maybe I'll comeback to it and make it well an fully fledged game for nostalgia. For now I my current goal is make a game at this level in an hour. Thank you guys for reading (If anyone finds this)!
